ruleContent.content: function convertToSimpleImgTags(content) { if (!content || typeof content !== "string") { return content; } var imgRegex = /(https?:\/\/[^\s]+?\.(?:jpg|png|webp|jpeg)(?:\?[^\s]*)?)/gi; var newContent = content.replace(imgRegex, function(url) { return ''; }); return newContent; } result = convertToSimpleImgTags(result);
